name: Catalyst
description: Catalyst is an oscilloscope-themed robot with the ability to transform into a cat. Equipped with sturdy metallic arms and legs resembling those of a feline, Catalyst is a member of the WebtrES club. Its classic screen displays vital information and data in a visually appealing manner. The robot is always ready for action, wearing a protective helmet as an add-on. Catalyst has been programmed with exceptional ability scores and skills, making it a formidable member of any team.
